short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for blocking ads on Google

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdBlock Extension is a powerful extension that helps you block annoying ads while browsing on Google. With this extension, you can enjoy a clean and uninterrupted browsing experience, free from intrusive ads that pop up on your screen.
